CMS_FormUserControl.UserControlParameters: <form></form>
CMS_FormUserControl.UserControlDescription: Provides a text field for entering user account passwords. Masks input by displaying dots instead of the typed-in characters. Validates the input according to the site's Password policy settings (Settings -> Security & Membership -> Passwords).

CMS_FormUserControl.UserControlParameters: <form><field column="ShowStrengthIndicator" visible="true" columntype="boolean" fieldtype="CustomUserControl" publicfield="false" guid="08a5c27f-016e-41c5-acdf-60e922a67922"><properties><fielddescription>If true, the calculated strength of the password will be shown below the textbox.</fielddescription><defaultvalue>True</defaultvalue><fieldcaption>Show strength indicator</fieldcaption></properties><settings><controlname>checkboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field></form>
CMS_FormUserControl.UserControlDescription: Provides a text field for entering user account passwords. Masks input by displaying dots instead of the typed-in characters. Validates the input according to the site's Password policy settings (Settings -> Security & Membership -> Passwords) and displays an indicator of the password strength.

CMS_FormUserControl.UserControlParameters: <form><field column="showstrength" fieldcaption="Show password strength" visible="true" defaultvalue="true" columntype="boolean" fieldtype="CustomUserControl" fielddescription="If true, the calculated strength of the password will be shown below the textbox." publicfield="false" guid="c4c2d1f5-a963-4370-bc07-6299011c09fd" visibility="none" displayinsimplemode="true"><settings><controlname>checkboxcontrol</controlname></settings></field></form>
CMS_FormUserControl.UserControlDescription: Provides two fields for entering user account passwords - one for the initial value, the second for confirmation. Masks input by displaying dots instead of the typed-in characters. Validates the input according to the site's Password policy settings (Settings -> Security & Membership -> Passwords) and can optionally display an indicator of the password strength.
